      • copy

        GraphicalModel<F> copy()
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Make a copy of the mutable parts of the model. This makes a deep copy of the model. Some unmutable parts are not copied though.

        The type of the returned object MUST be assignable to this type.

        Specified by:
        copy in interface Model<F extends GenericFactor>
        Returns:
